Posts.Content: Amazing news MSLady !! What a relief xx
Posts.Title: Breast Clinic Today

Posts.Content: Thanks for the replies ladies, it meams a lot!! Keep telling myself most lumps are ok but it’s not working!! Heads doing overtime!! Think I will  call the doctor back in the morning & Just explain that it now has a dimple/indent below it and see what they say ??
Posts.Title: Really worried !! Breast lump with indentation :-(

Posts.Content: Good luck on Tuesday MSlady, hopefully all good news !! So is that Just about a week u waited on your appointment for the breast clinic?  Xx
Posts.Title: Really worried !! Breast lump with indentation :-(

Posts.Content: Hi all, Found a lump about a week ago, it’s right about where my clevege starts on my left breast!! For the past year I have been prone to cysts, had them on my armpits, stomach, legs and a couple on my breasts!! Just now I have quite a large cyst under my left arm which appeared about a week before I noticed the lump on my breast was really painful to start with and although still quite inflamed the pain is gone.  Anyway at first I thought the lump on my breast was Just another cyst but it wasn’t like the others, there was no pain and I couldnt see it so I went to see my doctor on Thursday. Doctor examined me and advised Me to take a weeks course of antibiotics and return next Thursday for a further check up.  I was quite happy with that as I assumed she wasn’t too concerned.  However today an indent has appeared just below the lump and after taking to google I’m now worried sick !! I’m 37 with no family history of breast cancer which I know is in my favour but I can’t help worrying. Anyone had a similar experience ??  TIA  Xxx
Posts.Title: Really worried !! Breast lump with indentation :-(
